name: TOJI

name: KANEKI

name: LUFFY

name: ASTA

name: VEGETA

name: GENOS
desc: When the player reaches 20% if his health, all damages are reduced to 30% of their original value. Auto trains 95% of your chakra. Nerfs all player damage by 30% and buffs all damage by 15%

name: SASUKE

desc: When the player reaches 105 of his health, he will become immune to all attacks for 8 seconds. Train 80% of Chakra, 20% of Strength and 20% of Durability. He also nerfs all damage by 25% and buffs all damage by 50%

desc: Auto trains 125% Durability. Nerfs all player damage by 50% buffs all damage by 25% and increases your Chikara Per Min by x1.5

desc: Trains 60% Strength & 50% Durability every 4s. Buffs all Stand damage by 20%.

name: GON
desc: Train 50% Strength 50% Durability and 50% Chakra. He nerfs all incoming damage by 35%.

name: KRILLIN

name: ESCANOR
